DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study evaluate OGTT 18 20 gestational week early diagnosis method GDM low risk pregnant woman . By investigate maternal neonatal outcome associate early OGTT regular OGTT result , study provide evidence appropriate time perform OGTT pregnant woman .
DOC.brief_title: The Early Diagnosis Gestational Diabetes Mellitus Study
DOC.criteria: Singleton pregnant woman invite participate study 18 40 year age , first prenatal visit center 18 week 0 day gestation . Previous history GDM preexist DM Family history diabetes mellitus ( first degree relative diabetes sister GDM ) Body mass index > 30 kg/m2 Previous macrosomia ( baby birth weight > 4,000 g ) history stillbirth Polycystic ovary syndrome Medications : corticosteroid , antipsychotic Participant willing take OGTT twice ( 1820 gestational week 2428 gestational week ) , willing series prenatal care visit deliver center .
